name: Duck on Drugs
description:
Duck on drugs is a 2D platform game, currently under development at MageJam gamejam. According to the main topic "There are no rules", the story is about duck, drugs, pipes and quantum mechanics.

Our story begins in bathtub, where we are sucked into the drain. We are able to explore a colorfull, magic and undetermined world of pipes system, with no pipes but a lot of nervous systems with unfriendly attitude. Collect... things to gain points, we don't know why but you may want it.

The main goal is to survive at the end, when Schrödinger's duck will be determined if is alife or not. You can influence the chance of surviving by collecting pickups and loosing lifes... or you can't?
